title: 超能物质原作者弃坑了！？
txt_content:
今天上了超能物质原作者的网站发现他好像弃坑了。
这是他的话。
I’ve stopped development on Matter Overdrive indefinitely. Matter Overdrive is not being actively developed by me. Otmas is currently maintaining Matter Overdrive. You can contact him at devosmium@gmail.com

replies.author: Java_command
replies.txt_content: 原作者弃坑了，把锅扔给了Otmas，你可以通过那个邮件联系他
